data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "What are the advantages of growing up in the countryside rather than in a big city?"
data.answer: There are many advantages of growing up in the countryside rather than in a big city. These include the ability to be independent in dealing with problems. For example, I grew up in the countryside and a few months ago, I encountered the issue of losing my job. I immediately started looking for a new job by myself and finally found an even better-paid job. I attribute this to my growing environment because I learned how to live by myself and solve problems by myself. Therefore, being independent is an advantage of growing up in rural areas.
